name: Hidden Room
longDes:
You enter what appears to have been a hidden bedroom.

The scene is a horror. You see ^Chef# Staker standing with his back to you, holding a bloody cleaver.

Beyond is a bed, and red, everywhere red. You are thankful you can't make out the details.

The lock of ~hair# seems to vibrate in your hand. Your only exit is back to the $west#.
shortDes: You re-enter the hidden room. The ^chef# is standing with his back to you. He is holding a bloody cleaver. There is an exit back to the attic to the $west#.

features.name: chef
features.preActionDes: The ^chef# is standing with his back to you. He is holding a bloody cleaver.
features.inActionDes: You call out to the chef and hold out the lock of hair. He wheels on you with the cleaver.
